adHeader: YOU RENTED THE TRUCK OR POD(NOW HIRE US)*MOVING LABOR ONLY*LAST MIN OK
adDetails: PROFESSIONAL MOVING LABOR WE COVER ALL OF BAY AREA ---- Serving all of Bay Area for 3 years now! Excellent references! Need help moving? Loading? Unloading? Last-minute? Pods, containers, U-hauls, storage, full moves (big and small), same complex moves, etc. Yes! We can handle your BIG house move! Call us! Get 2 movers for $55 per hour or 3 movers for $85! Two hour minimum. We work smart and fast! We provide all moving equipment at no extra charge. (dollies, pads, straps, and tools) You rent the U-Haul (Budget, Penske, etc.) and we will load it, unload it, and even drive it for you! Save hundreds, even THOUSANDS, organizing your move this way! Call today show contact info Hours: 7am-11pm
